Literature.Title: Structure, conformation and biological activity of a novel lipodepsipeptide from Pseudomonas corrugata: cormycin A
Literature.Author: Scaloni A, Dalla Serra M, Amodeo P, Mannina L, Vitale RM, Segre AL, Cruciani O, Lodovichetti F, Greco ML, Fiore A, Gallo M, D'Ambrosio C, Coraiola M, Menestrina G, Graniti A, Fogliano V

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=0.02 µM,Rabbit erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=0.025 µM,Sheep erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=0.1 µM
